name: The Dreamscape (Amran)
description:
The Dreamscape is a Global Game Jam 2016 entry.

It tells a story of a man who dreams of two sibling beings, Caos the Destroyer and Pace the Creator. Within his dream, the man saw the two beings racing with each other, each striving to win the other to turn the fate of the world in their favour.

How to play

  • The player will have to quickly draw out the patterns on the screen.

Best used to play with a touchscreen on a landscape mode.
